message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price more around $12000. I believe it's a good compromise considering its value and rarity.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $16000. I believe this price is still a great value considering its unique features and rarity.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $14000, but that's the highest I can go. Can you consider this offer?
